price: ߊ߲ ߣߐ߬ ߛߊ߲ߜߙߋ߫ ߥߐߙߐ߲ߥߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߊ߲߫ ߠߴߊߟߎ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߲ ߘߏ߲߬ ߖߊ߲߬ߓߐߣߍ߲߫ ߕߍ߫ ߘߊ߲ߠߌ߲ ߘߐ߫ ߝߋߎ߫
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلۡخَلۡقِ غَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā fawqakum sabʿa ṭarāiqa wamā kunnā ʿani al-khalqi ghāfilīna
